column4: does anyone know a program that can make gamepads move the mouse or make keystrokes
mouve the mouse yes; but you sure you want to type with a gamepad?
not all of the games that i have are joystick compatible
what is it called i have to got eat dinner
not really sure what you have in mind--please provide more info
i have a microsoft controller that rotates, is there a way i cud make the axis control the mouse
ah a MS one; not sure on that--I have a generic usb gamepad type controller that can move the mouse
i can calibrate it and it works so i know its outputting, its usb, so i cud prolly do it the same way as u did
I just did it through the app I was using (dosbox) and it was fine
what is DosBox supposed to do
sorry, dosbox is a way to run abandoned dos games--more info at www.abandonia.com
ag, thats not what im looking for, the game that i am trying to do its a Quake based game called nexuiz
it cant use the axis on the controller to change the camera so i am trying to find a work around
the gaming section on ubuntuforums might help with that
